item.title: SafeRAG: Benchmarking Security in Retrieval-Augmented Generation of Large Language Model
item.description: SafeRAG: A new benchmark exposes critical security vulnerabilities in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems by introducing four novel attack types and a comprehensive dataset for evaluation, re…
